description: BIDS RECEIVED BY FAX AND EMAIL WILL BE ACCEPTED AS OFFICIAL. BIDS RECEIVED IN-PERSON OR BY COURIER WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED;...)reader = json.loads(data)… except:print(
full_summary:
### Kirkfield Lift Lock Urgent Repairs Tender Announcement

#### Call for Bids

The federal government department, Parks Canada, is issuing an invitation to tender (ITT) for the urgent repairs to the Kirkfield Lift Lock, a vital water infrastructure facility in Ontario. The successful bidder will be responsible for executing the necessary repairs to ensure the safe and efficient operation of the facility for the 2023 season.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01011601
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-22-0175/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 8, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Evaluation Type**: Two-phase selection process
* **Bidder Selection Criteria**: Qualifications and experience of the Bidder

#### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for November 2nd, 2022, at 10:00 AM EDT. Interested bidders are required to attend this meeting to gain a deeper understanding of the project requirements and to address any questions or concerns. Bidders must communicate their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend at least 24 hours prior to the meeting.

#### Instructions for Bidders

* Bidders are required to submit their bids in two phases: Phase One covering qualifications and experience, and Phase Two covering the financial evaluation.
* Bidders must ensure that their email submissions meet the maximum file size limit of 15 megabytes.
* Bidders are responsible for any failure or delay resulting from the transmission or receipt of their email bids.
* Bidders must review and comply with the National Park Act and its regulations.

#### Contact Information

For any technical or contractual questions, please contact:
Sheldon Lalonde
Contracting Officer
Parks Canada Agency
30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3
Phone: 343-585-3836
Email: [Sheldon.Lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:Sheldon.Lalonde@pc.gc.ca)

#### Required Documents

* Invitation to Tender (ITT)
* Plan and specifications
* Terms and conditions of the bid
* Bid submission template

By participating in this tender process, bidders acknowledge that they have read and understood the instructions and requirements outlined in this announcement and the attached documents. Please ensure that you submit your bids in accordance with the specified format and requirements. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. bid submissions
